ComicInfo.Summary: Early in the morning 2 riders approach a homestead. One of the men approaches the house and speaks to the man working on its construction. The horseman approaches and speaks with Garrison telling him of the attack on Aramus' family. Angered but his depression at the loss of his wife and drinking seem to have taken away his will to fight. Meanwhile Calibretto looks after the exhausted Gully while Knolan heads into town for food and clothes for their guest. Answering the door the robot is stunned by the trackers and a waking Gully has no choice but to don the gloves in the hopes of defending herself. the Gloves prove more than effective and Gully defeats her stalker.. and in a rage takes its life. Calibretto reboots and cleans up the rest. Returning to a destroyed home Knolan realizes that the gauntlets have been used and quickly calms down when he finds Gully safe and sound. Meanwhile Red Monika readies for battle and Raimon is given an exquisite gift thats turns out to be a very stern message from the shadowy mastermind behind the current events.
